instructions: 直走經過右手邊的XIMEA、XGRIDS、Connection Lounge，約 3 個攤位。
目的地就在前方的 IBV-MOVE4D。

companies.name: IBV- MOVE4D
companies.description:
At the Instituto de Biomecánica (IBV), we study the behaviour of the human body and how it interacts with products, the environment and services that people use.
We combine know-how from biomechanics, ergonomics and emotional engineering, which we apply through different areas of knowledge to several sectors in order to provide a response to their challenges and help foster business innovation.
